# AVCoordinatedPlaybackSuspension

**Class**

An object that represents a temporary suspension of coordinated playback.

## Declaration

```swift
class AVCoordinatedPlaybackSuspension
```

## Overview

See the playback coordinator’s [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVPlaybackCoordinator/beginSuspension(for:)] method for details about suspending playback.

## Inspecting a suspension

- **beginDate**: The time the suspension begins.
- **reason**: The reason for the suspension.
- **AVCoordinatedPlaybackSuspension.Reason**: Constants that identify playback suspension reasons.

## Ending a suspension

- **end()**: Ends a suspension.
- **end(proposingNewTime:)**: Ends a suspension and proposes a new playback time to the group.

## Initializers

- **init(_:)**: Creates a suspension with a string.
- **init(rawValue:)**: Creates a suspension with a raw string value.

## Suspending state coordination

- **beginSuspension(for:)**: Tells the coordinator to stop sending playback commands temporarily when the playback object disconnects from the group activity.
- **expectedItemTime(atHostTime:)**: Returns a time in the current item’s timeline that the coordinator expects to play at the specified host time.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
